Good Comments: The audio didn't match up with the video, the kareoke didn't match up with the lyrics, and the video quality was kind of blurry. However, I finally know that it's saying "This program is brought to you by our sponsors."
A lot of spelling errors, e.g. "tough" instead of "thought. Didn't use capital letters most of the time. Left out a lot of fullstops, commas and question marks. Thick, ugly font.
Bad Comments: This is the group where Kuro-Hana branched out, so they also did a good job, but KH's work is preferable.

Good Comments: Bad grammar/spelling/overall translation and use of chatspeak. It irks me that I as someone who doesn't understand Japanese have to put my faith in people whose English is worse than mine, while it's not even my first language!
Bad grammar. Used non-HD quality videos when they were available.
eps 443 to 445 are an amalgamation of typos, bad translation and bad timing. 3 characters dialog in 1 run-on subtitle, too lazy to time it for each character.. bleh
They subbed some episodes, so can't hate them a ton or anything
No differentiating between speakers, bad spelling, using "u" instead of you. Bad grammar. Terrible overall.
Bad Comments: You can see how they put many "i"s at the end of the karaoke of the opening theme, which is wrong because the voice only sang "i" twice. Bad spelling/grammar/translations and used chatting spelling and grammar
Epic fail at translating, plus typos, bad grammar, and timing/walls of text. Do not want
Feels like I'm reading Chinese subs (do these guys really know Japanese?).
fail without doubt... but! in most cases their subs are only subs available =(
Really bad. Ep448: Missing dialogue (starting with the first line!), mistranslations, bad timing, hard to read font... second only to XCHKS lol
These subs aren't even understandable. Any eps they made where considered "unsubbed" and where remade by DCTP.

Poor translation, poor quality, terrible grammar.

Its sad to see that i need to rely on subbed episodes of this show that is worse spelling and grammar then mine.

Good Comments:
RIDICULOUS. Why would you do this if you don't know CRAP?
Please stop staining the image of the fansub scene!
Bad Comments: Timing, karaoke, video encode, typesetting are average. (6/10) Translation is very bad. (2/10)
